inclusion.criterion: Men over 40 being suspicious of prostate cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject with PSA ≥ 4 and designated for biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must be able to attend all scheduled visits and to comply with all trial procedures
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject must be covered by public health insurance
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject with histologically confirmed prostate cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject with a verified viral infection (HIV or Hepatitis)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with a history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days. Abdominopelvic CT scan revealed a large prostate and a bladder filled with urine.
